title: Cardano Project in Spanish
description: Lack of Spanish content for the Cardano Project

title: Spanish News, Insights, Onboarding
description: Cardano education and resources for everyday people are few and far between in any language. The gap is even wider for Spanish Speakers.

title: Translating ProjectCatalyst
description: People cant build up multilingual resources if the innovation hub (ProjectCatalyst) itself doesn\`t reach them in their local language.

title: French & Arabic resources &trainers
description: Many African entrepreneurs are not exposed to Cardano because the initial information is given in English.

title: French website to learn cardano
description: There is no french website on the web where people can go to learn the  cardano ecosystem. Concepts as  Defi or Nft etc.. should be known.

title: Japanese SPO community management
description:
\-Few English-speakers in Japan

\-Most of technical documents are in English

\-Difficulty in expanding Japanese community

title: Pull strategy for Spain
description: Spanish society already has enough resources to translate a web page. In Spain que need that someone educated speak to us about Cardano.

title: Content translation for Chinese
description:
\- Chinese version of the Cardano related content is needed.

\- Project Catalyst mainly in English, barrier to Chinese speakers.

title: SEMANA CARDANO
description: I am trying to dissolve the English Language barrier making Cardano fully accessible to the second most natively spoken language: Spanish.

title: Multilingual Cardano Chatbot & KB
description: Learning about Cardano shouldn't require English. Globally, 83% of people don't speak English & 58 other languages have 20mil+ speakers.

title: Multilingual NFT artist Giveaway
description:
How to increase ADA exposure to our Stake SPO delegation and Rewards system?

In a multilingual, worldwide stage.

title: A Graphic Cardano Knowledge Corpus
description: Human language (text or speech) is varied, nuanced, & not the optimal exclusive medium for learning complex systems, concepts, or processes.

title: Educational Content in a Single Web
description: The extensive library of educational content for the development in Cardano is inefficiently dispersed and barely translated into Spanish.

title: Bring Smart Contracts to Vietnam
description: Detailed step-by-step instructions and feasible examples for learning Marlowe and Plutus are not available in the Vietnamese language.

title: Multi-Source Translation Pipeline
description:
Allow more public content to be available in multiple languages

\- Developer Documentation

\- Tutorials

\- Blog posts

\- Catalyst Proposals

title: [Romania] Cardano Business Club
description: Cardano Romania entrepreneurial community is not at all developed and lacks the means to come together and co-create value

title: Cardano Romania Community Knowledge
description: Cardano blockchain doesn't have content in Romania and community is struggling if they don't speak English very well

title: Cardano BI - Native languages
description: The Cardano BI solution currently supports English. To support more languages we must add some functionality and get help from translators

title: Cardano news in Chinese
description: In Taiwan, a lot of people know ADA, but only very few of them have heard of Cardano Project Catalyst. This is due to language barriers.

title: Translate NFT-MAKER to German
description: The entry barrier for non-English speaking people to Cardano products is very high, this slows adoption down significantly.

title: Localize Yoroi in French
description: Yoroi light-weight is crucial as everyday users will use it to interact with the Cardano ecosystem at large.

title: Short videos in (african) french
description: There's a lack of videos in (african) french about the working of Cardano's blockchain.

title: On-boarding East Asia Today!
description: Despite a population of billions, East Asians are underrepresented in Catalyst due to a lack of localised content.

title: Coding Pods
description: We are at a disadvantage if we are unable to communicate technological innovations because of language barriors.

title: The Catalyst School - Multilanguage
description: How do we facilitate and support the participation of non-fluent/native English speakers in Project Catalyst?

title: ALDEA Wiki - Phase 2 - Portuguese
description: There is no place where to find all the documentation and information being produced by an ever growing Cardano community.

title: French Intro to Cardano in Burkina
description: There are just a few educational resources available for African French Speakers

title: Voter tool translations - AIM
description: Voter-tools, the community made tool is only in English. Resources are needed to translate the tool into other languages.

title: Translation into Amharic
description: There are no Cardano content in any of the local languages in Ethiopia

title: 100 Cardano animations non English
description: News & education about Cardano & blockchain should be available in native languages. However, The crypto world is English-speaking oriented

title: Translation - Ukrainian - Russian
description: Many people don't speak English well

title: Cardano Center Poland - web and SM
description: More than 1 out of 10 Polish people heard about cryptocurrencies. How do we enable and encourage them to get to know the Cardano ecosystem?

title: Lovelace translation Portuguese
description: The language barrier should be lowered with solutions that bring content in many languages.

title: Indonesian Community Web-Portal
description:
*   No trusted Indonesian Language web/portal for all about Cardano
*   Indonesia low proficiency on English
*   Scattered Community SPOs

title: Babelada - Translation Community
description: Cardano learning resources are affordable for English speakers. What about others? There are 2.26B non English speakers worldwide (Statista)

title: CatalystSchool - Eastern Hemisphere
description: How do we onboard new members of the Eastern Hemisphere community into Catalyst?

title: SPOCRA: Expand Geographic Reach
description: A communication barrier exists between non-English speaking SPO communities and SPOCRA preventing voices to be heard and content accessible.

title: Catalyst Course in Vietnamese
description: A survey on Vietnamese Community showed that 89% don't know/don't care about Catalyst-an important project that promotes cardano ecosystem

title: Encourage Adoption in Universities
description: people tend to follow something that booming. we already heard a lot of success in cryptocurrency, but very few in creating smart contract.

title: Educational materials about Cardano
description: As Cardano ecosystem grows, there is a constant need for educational materials in different languages.

title: GameChanger: IPS Program
description: Direct limited incentives to newcomers and complex tooling will not guarrantee a continuous multilingual onboarding into Cardano
